meeting_request.purpose: I'm having a hard time keeping up with the course material in my English honors seminar
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm April, a senior majoring in English. This is the second semester of my honors English course, and I’m really struggling to understand the complex ideas being covered. Some of the readings are really challenging and require deep analysis, and I’m finding it hard to separate between what I’ve already understood and what I need to understand now. I’m also feeling overwhelmed by the course load overall, with two other majors and a minor and a bunch of required writing courses. I’m not doing well in any of my other courses, and this is starting to affect my grades. I’m hoping to talk to someone about how to stay on track in this semester and improve my academic performance.
